author: Dr. Tim Sandle
title: Be careful what you click: Rise in scam messages - Digital Journal
text:
Laptops are useful, but bring with them privacy and security concerns. — Photo: © Tim Sandle. In this increasing digital landscape, hackers are constantly finding new ways to exploit unsuspecting individuals, so you could be in greater danger than you think. A recent dangerous text message scam is completely draining victims’ bank accounts.
One of the most common tools cybercriminals use to breach your data are pop-ups, those small windows that appear while browsing a website. These are often disguised as legitimate messages from trusted entities like banks or phone carriers, which aim for your personal information.
Jason Mountford, researcher and writer at Compare Banks , tells Digital Journal to never click the words “Yes,” “No,” “Agree,” or “OK” in a pop-up, as you could be downloading spyware, a malicious software that can obtain all your usernames, passwords, and credit card numbers.
The only way to get rid of those pop-ups is by hitting the red X or closing your browser.
There are some red flags that can help you identify potential threats, such as the urgency of the messages, unusual payment requests, and requests to download apps.
To reduce the risk of falling victim to these types of scams, Mountford recommends following these tips 4 tips:
Install Ad-Blockers
If you do not want to see any more pop-ups, one of the best solutions is to install an ad-blocker on your browser. Ad-blockers will remove the vast majority of pop-ups, along with other types of annoying ads.
“Ad-blocking extensions are easy to install and are one of the best ways to avoid intrusive, interruptive, or repetitive ads while also getting faster page speeds” says Mountford.
Improve Your Digital Habits
Users are constantly exposed to all types of dangers on the internet, so exercising extra caution while browsing should be a must.
“Avoid clicking on suspicious links and double-check them if necessary, even if you think they come from a reliable source. Hackers often create links that resemble official ones to lure users into clicking them,” warns Mountford.
Use Strong Passwords
The simpler the password, the easier it is for hackers to obtain. Users should keep their eyes open for any unusual activity within their online accounts.
“Change your passwords every three months. The ideal password should be at least 16 characters long and consist of a random combination of mixed-case letters, numbers, and symbols,’’ recommends Mountford.
Update Your System Regularly
Each system update tends to include security patches to ensure user safety and fix potential issues.
Mountford explains: “These patches commonly include solutions for vulnerabilities that are exploited by spyware and other malicious programs. Updating your system can be key to avoiding an attack. Also, ensure to download and use your web browser’s latest, most secure version”.

author: VNExplorer
title: Llegan casi diez días con temperaturas por encima de los 100 grados a San Antonio
text: The sun sets over Sydney Harbour, with the outline of skyscrapers and residential towers of Milsons Point and North Sydney. This image was taken from Dover Heights at sunset in winter. SAN ANTONIO - Un periodo de intenso calor con temperaturas diarias que fluctuarán entre los 99 y 105 grados comenzará este viernes. Las altas temperaturas se extenderán, al menos, hasta el 11 de agosto, según explicó Ariel Rivera Vázquez, nuestro jefe de meteorología. Cada uno de estos días el índice de calor sobrepasará los 100 grados. Ante este panorama, prepara los abanicos, acondicionadores de aire y todo lo que sirva para enfrentar el calor que llega a San Antonio y el centro sur de Texas. Lamentablemente, aunque para el domingo hay una ligera posibilidad de aguaceros, el resto de los primeros 15 días de agosto serán secos y calientes. A pesar de que nos enfrentamos al calor típico de verano en Texas, desde mayo hasta el inicio de este agosto el termómetro en el Aeropuerto Internacional de San Antonio ha alcanzado los 100 grados o más sólo en 12 ocasiones. Es en ese lugar donde se toma la lectura oficial de la temperatura.

author: Agencia Efe
title: Polémica en Italia por el intento de un imam de rezar una plegaria en una acampada propalestina
text:
Oriente Próximo
Polémica en Italia por el intento de un imam de rezar una plegaria en una acampada propalestina
La Policía de Turín impide la oración musulmana porque la universidad Politécnica, donde se iba a celebrar, es un espacio laico
La Jefatura de Policía de Turín emitió este viernes una advertencia para que no se lleve a cabo una oración musulmana que se iba a celebrar este viernes, en la misma jornada que una acampada propalestina en la Universidad Politécnica de esa localidad del norte de Italia.
Los planes de llevar a cabo el rezo del viernes -plegaria islámica principal de la semana- en un centro universitario público, espacio secular, creó polémica en el país después de que el viernes pasado se celebrara ya una primera oración musulmana en esa Universidad, también en el marco de las
protestas en solidaridad con Gaza.
Tras ello, la dirección universitaria reafirmó "firmemente el carácter laico de la institución", y todo ello también llevó a dar pasos a la ministra de Universidad e Investigación, Anna Maria Bernini, que pidió explicaciones por el rezo al rectorado. Este último aseguró que la oración se hizo en el marco de la ocupación por parte de los estudiantes del centro, sin su permiso propio.
Con todo, tras un nuevo rezo previsto para este viernes en el gran salón de la Politécnica de Turín, el rectorado del centro avisó a la Policía, que emitió una advertencia para impedir la celebración del acto religioso, que fue finalmente cancelado.
El imam que debía liderar la oración, Brahim Baya, también miembro de la Coordinación de Turín para Gaza, acusó a las autoridades italianas de "islamofobia" ante el requerimiento contra el rezo.
Este mayo se han organizado protestas y acampadas pidiendo el fin de la ofensiva israelí sobre Gaza y el
boicot académico a Israel en centros universitarios de varias ciudades italianas, entre ellas Roma, Milán, Bolonia o Turín, en el marco de las movilizaciones estudiantiles en universidades de distintos países del mundo.
En los últimos años, a medida que ha ganado influencia la extrema derecha en Italia, los discurso tachados de islamófobos o contra la llegada de migrantes musulmanes se han hecho más comunes en el país.

author: Ellen Maistrenko
title: No More Rabbit Holes: A Skin Type Quiz to Change Lives
text:
Your skin can communicate. All it takes is to learn the simple language!
Your skin type is definitive when it comes to combining an ideal care routine. No amount of branded and high-quality products won’t work their magic on your complexion if they are designed for other types of skin than yours. Is it oily, dry, or normal? It is time to unveil some secrets that your skin has to tell you! That is a quick and entertaining skin type quiz, and get to know your skin on a first-name basis!
Take This What Is My Skin Type Quiz and Perfect Your Care Routine What’s Your Skin Type? Quiz
Wondering whether your skin is oily, dry, combination, sensitive, or normal? Answer 10 quick questions to discover your true skin type — and get product tips tailored just for you!
1 / 10
1. How does your skin feel a few hours after washing your face (with no products)?
Dry or flaky in some areas Easily irritated or tight Shiny, especially on the T-zone Comfortable, balanced Tight and flaky all over 2 / 10
2. What does your skin look like in the morning?
Shiny, especially on the T-zShiny, especially in the T-zoneone Some oily spots and dry patches Dull or dry all over Slightly flushed or patchy Fresh and balanced 3 / 10
3. How often do you experience breakouts?
In oily zones only Frequently, especially in the T-zone Occasionally, especially when stressed or reacting to products Rarely Hardly ever, but some dry spots clog 4 / 10
4. How are your pores?
Large, especially around nose/forehead Small and tight Noticeable in oily areas only Small, but sometimes inflamed Not very noticeable 5 / 10
5. How does your skin behave in cold weather?
Slightly drier, but still balanced Feels normal or even oilier Gets red, itchy, or inflamed Cheeks dry, T-zone stays normal Becomes tight and flaky 6 / 10
6. How does your skin behave in humid weather?
T-zone becomes oily, rest stays the same May react with redness or itchiness A bit more glowy, but still balanced Slightly more hydrated, but never oily Becomes shiny and prone to clogged pores 7 / 10
7. Do you need to reapply moisturizer during the day?
Yes, skin dries out quickly Yes, if skin reacts or feels tight Only on certain areas (like cheeks) Not really No, my skin stays oily enough 8 / 10
8. How does your skin react to sun exposure?
Burns or turns red easily Tans evenly with light SPF Feels irritated and drier T-zone gets shiny, cheeks stay dry Gets greasy and may break out 9 / 10
9. How does your skin react to new skincare products?
Some products clog pores or dry out areas Often feels more dry or irritated Usually fine with most Redness, burning, or irritation is common Products often feel too heavy or cause breakouts 10 / 10
10. What does your skin feel like by midday?
Oily on forehead/nose, dry on cheeks Slightly itchy or reactive Still comfortable Greasy or shiny all over Tight or flaky Did you receive your fair share of insight into your skin type? You can use these tips to improve your care regimen instantly. However, a consultation with a certified cosmetologist will provide you with more information on how to perfect the routine and let your complexion radiate health!

author: ( Image: Reach)
title: Prime Finds: Clever kids toy storage solutions to help your home stay mess-free
text:
In this week's edition of her Prime Finds series, Shopping Writer Meghan has picked her Top 5 storage solutions to keeping kids' belongings tidy without breaking the bank In this week's instalment of my Prime Finds series, I've scoured Amazon for some of the best storage solutions you can buy to help manage the mess in your child's or children's rooms.
Whether you're looking for something simple and minimalist to ensure their favourite stuffed toys, Lego sets and board games are kept out of the way - or whether you're looking for something that offers multiple uses to keep you and your kids entertained and mess-free this January - I've got you covered. Here are my Top 5 storage solutions on Amazon to keep your home organised without breaking the bank.
READ MORE: Where to shop 'stylish' leopard print coat Frankie Bridge recommends for 'elevating' any look
READ MORE: Steal Cat Deeley's cosy look from This Morning with cashmere sweater that's perfect for winter
1. Stuffed Animal Storage Bean Bag
Shop here for £22.59
Image: Amazon) Amazon)
Up first is an innovative option I probably could've used when I was younger. At just over £20, this stuffed animal storage find offers a variety of uses beyond keeping your kid's beloved plushies in one place. You fill the cylindrical cover with their stuffed friends, zip from top to bottom, and viola—you now have a multi-functional piece of furniture that can be used for multiple purposes, and the mess is kept at bay.
They can use it as a pillow, bean bag seat, boxing bag (that won't hurt their little hands), or just as a convenient and easy-to-use storage solution that makes putting stuffed toys away and retrieving them so much easier.
2. Toy Box Storage Chest with Wheels
Shop here for £25.99
Image: Amazon) Amazon)
If there's one thing you likely can't predict with your little tyke, it's when and where they'll want to reach for any particular toy. They could be in their room, downstairs or…
( Image: Reach)

author: 自由時報電子報
title: 《AI 快學堂-12》ChatGPT全新學習模式這樣用！變身家教不秒給答案 - 自由電子報 3C科技
text:
ChatGPT推出全新的學習模式，讓學生培養思考能力。（圖／路透社）
ChatGPT越來越普及，不少學生開始用它來查資料、寫作業、甚至解題。但也引發討論，長期依賴AI會不會讓人漸漸失去思考能力？OpenAI最近推出全新功能「學習模式。它最大的特色是，不會直接告訴你答案，而是像一位有耐心的「私人家教」，引導學生一步步學會。
這項功能不再是單向地丟出標準答案，而是著重互動與引導，透過蘇格拉底式提問、分段講解與個人化教學，引導學生深入理解，培養思考能力，同時降低對AI的過度依賴。
請繼續往下閱讀...
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: VNExplorer
title: Belinda está hospitalizada y cancela concierto; esto sabemos sobre su estado de salud
text:
Belinda
Belinda fue hospitalizada de emergencia, así lo dieron a conocer por medio de un comunicado que fue publicado en las redes sociales de la cantante. Debido a esto, la intérprete de “Luz sin gravedad” tuvo que cancelar un concierto que daría en Coatzacoalcos, Veracruz.
En el comunicado se explica que debido a órdenes del doctor que atienden a Belinda, la famosa tuvo que ser hospitalizada, sin embargo, no dieron a conocer la razón por la que la cantante está en el nosocomio.
Te recomendamos: ¡Con Belinda, Luis Gerardo Méndez y más! Revelan el elenco de ‘Mentiras, la serie’
“Lamentamos informales que Belinda no podrá presentarse al concierto programa para el día viernes 22 de marzo en la Expo Feria Coatza. Debido a un problema de salud, por indicaciones de su médico, tuvo que ser hospitalizada”.
Finalmente, en el comunicado lamentaron que Belinda no pueda presentarse en el evento, pero lo más importante siempre será la salud de la famosa.
“La salud de Belinda es nuestra principal preocupación en este momento. Esperamos poder reprogramar el concierto en una próxima fecha”.
comunicado Belinda
Belinda comparte foto desde el hospital Por medio de sus historias de Instagram, Belinda compartió una foto que tomó desde el hospital. En la imagen se observa su mano conectada al suero, mientras abraza un peluche. Detrás de la cantante también se puede ver otro muñeco.
La famosa compartió la imagen junto con un texto en el que compartió que para ella siempre la salud será lo más importante.
“La salud siempre tiene que ser lo más importante”.
historia Belinda
Hasta el momento Belinda tampoco ha dado a conocer la razón por la que fue hospitalizada. Esto ocurre en medio de su regreso a la música, después de que hace unas semanas lanzara su canción “Cactus” cuya letra contiene varias indirectas a Christian Nodal.
Por si fuera poco, sus fans esperan que Belinda este año lance nuevo disco, el cual podría contener colaboraciones con Natanael Cano y el rapero Alemán.
PJG
